EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Singapore Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering for the Pivotal Cloud-Native Roadshow! Please see event details below and feel free to contact us at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Thursday, September 14, 2017 {{my.Singapore:default=edit me}}
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Google 70 Pasir Panjang Road, #03-71, Mapletree Business City, Singapore 117371
Agenda: Review the full agenda HERE <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/singapore?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>
For more in-depth reading on cloud-native, please visit our dedicated topic page on cloud-native applications <[[https://pivotal.io/cloud-native]]>.
Thank you, The Pivotal Team
